name: Jinan
title: Jinan - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Jinan, the capital of Shandong Province, is known as the 'City of Springs' for its 72 famous natural springs. With a history dating back over 2,000 years, Jinan offers beautiful natural springs, historic sites, and serves as a gateway to Mount Tai, one of China's most sacred mountains.

highlights.attractions: Baotu Spring Park, Daming Lake, Thousand Buddha Mountain, Lingyan Temple
highlights.cuisine: Shandong Cuisine, Sweet and Sour Carp, Dezhou Braised Chicken, Jinan Dumplings
highlights.bestTime: Spring (April-May) and Autumn (September-October) with pleasant weather

dishes.name: Jinan Dumplings

gettingThere: By Air: Jinan Yaoqiang International Airport (TNA) with domestic and international flights
By Train: High-speed rail connects Jinan to Beijing, Shanghai, and major cities
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from neighboring provinces
gettingAround: Metro: Modern subway system connecting major areas
Walking: Best way to explore spring areas and historic districts

Afternoon: Explore Daming Lake and its scenic surroundings

Morning: Climb Thousand Buddha Mountain for city views

Morning: Explore local markets and spring areas
Afternoon: Visit museums and cultural centers
